title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 810.7 - Scholarship eligibility criteria
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 810.7 - Scholarship eligibility criteria

State Regulations

Each local government receiving an achievement award shall
establish eligibility criteria and procedures for awarding its
scholarship. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
810.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
